rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Chorrul wants to become a
merchant at a Nopon Guild when
Chorrul grows up!

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0002
rows.name:
There are eleven individual Guilds in
the Nopon Trade Guild family.

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Biggest of all eleven is of course
the Avaritia Guild.

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Next biggest is the Voltis Trade Guild,
and so on all the way down to the
weakest Guild called Pyrithium.

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0005
rows.name:
Chorrul thinks Avaritia Guild
is probably the best to join.

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0006
rows.name:
But apparently it isn't that easy.
First you have to make some kind of
special coin as a symbol of the Guild?

rows.label: tlk42420151_02_msg0007
rows.name:
Still, Chorrul will work hard
to achieve this dream!
